text: June Muriel Brown, MBE (16 February 1927 â€“ 3 April 2022) was an English actress. She was known for her role as Dot Cotton in the long-running BBC soap opera EastEnders, a part she played from 1985 to 1993, and again from 1997 to 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Suffolk
